Package net.phoenix.core.saveddata

Class UniqueMultiblockSavedData

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.level.saveddata.SavedData
net.phoenix.core.saveddata.UniqueMultiblockSavedData
public class UniqueMultiblockSavedData extends net.minecraft.world.level.saveddata.SavedData
Stores unique multiblock data for ALL owners (teams). Structure: ownerUUID â†’ UniqueMultiblockData Each UniqueMultiblockData stores: multiblockType â†’ (dimension, pos) This allows: - One Tesla Tower per team - Dimension-aware saving - Easy lookup for hatches
